channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Zelensky Chooses Applause From Democrats Over Survival
item.description: By listening to those who flatter his ego but are only interested in 'resisting' Trump, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky hurt his cause.

item.title: Democratizing American Prosperity
item.description: To help resolve the gap between America’s richest and poorest, we must let free markets lift the bottom up.

item.title: Blame Trump for the Oval Office Fiasco with Zelensky
item.description: Yes, Ukraine’s president performed incompetently, but he is not the reason for Friday’s debacle.

item.title: Driving a Stake Through Stakeholder Capitalism
item.description: A review of Andy Puzder’s new book, A Tyranny for the Good of Its Victims .

item.title: Bring Back Slut Shaming
item.description: It's not just the things people wear that deserve scorn. It's also the things they don't.

item.title: Big DEI Booster Revamping K-12 History Curriculum In Republican-Run Iowa
item.description: The consultant coordinating Iowa's social studies revamp has a long history of pushing anti-Constitution prejudices about American history.

item.title: How Biden’s Blank Check For Ukraine Disastrously Bounced
item.description: Americans were told that, with enough help, Ukraine could liberate all of its territory. It was a murderous lie.

item.title: Predicting the Next Pope Isn’t What Matters the Most
item.description: Pope Francis teaches us about hope and mercy from a Roman hospital bed.

item.title: Wyoming Gov. Mark Gordon Refuses To Say If He’ll Sign A Bill Requiring Proof Of Citizenship For Elections
item.description: Gov. Mark Gordon won't say if he'll sign a bill requiring Wyoming residents to provide proof of citizenship when registering to vote.

item.title: Republicans Are Fooling Themselves on the Ukraine War
